name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant Mexican eatery specializing in tacos and tequila, with bold flavors and a lively setting.

name: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
description: A trendy spot with creative American fare, craft cocktails, and frequent live music events.

name: New World Bistro Bar
description: Eclectic menu with global influences, featuring locally sourced ingredients and a focus on bold, creative dishes.

name: Cafe Capriccio
description: A long-standing Albany staple for traditional Italian cuisine, known for its warm ambiance and classic recipes.

name: Mexican Market
description: A hidden gem offering authentic tacos and Mexican street food, paired with a small market for specialty ingredients.

name: Jack's Oyster House
description: An iconic Albany institution since 1913, specializing in fresh oysters and classic seafood dishes.

name: The Ruck
description: A divey pub with killer wings, craft beers, and live music, a staple of Troy's nightlife scene.

name: Yono's
description: An upscale dining experience blending Indonesian and French cuisines, perfect for special occasions.

name: El Loco Mexican Cafe
description: A colorful spot for authentic Mexican dishes, especially known for tacos and margaritas.

name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que
description: A regionally iconic spot for smoky ribs, brisket, and Southern sides, with a lively riverfront location.

name: Tara Kitchen
description: A warm, family-run spot serving authentic Moroccan tagines and Mediterranean flavors.

name: Taqueria Tren Maya
description: A newer addition to Albany's taco scene, offering authentic flavors inspired by the Yucatan region.
